mapper.select: SELECT edc_no , edc_sort , edc_way , educator , edc_target , edc_grade , edc_psncpa , edc_title , edc_content , recruit_sdate , recruit_edate , edc_sdate , edc_edate , edc_active FROM education

SELECT em.empl_no, e.edc_title, b.book_name FROM edc_request r JOIN employee em ON em.empl_no = r.edc_aplc JOIN education e ON e.edc_no = r.edc_no JOIN edc_book eb ON eb.edc_no = e.edc_no JOIN book b ON b.book_no = eb.book_no WHERE em.empl_no = 'test';

SELECT edc_no AS edcNo, edc_sort AS edcSort, edc_way AS edcWay, educator, edc_target AS edcTarget, edc_grade AS edcGrade, edc_psncpa AS edcPsncpa, edc_title AS edcTitle, edc_content AS edcContent, TO_CHAR(recruit_sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS recruitSdateFormatted, TO_CHAR(recruit_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS recruitEdateFormatted, TO_CHAR(edc_sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS edcSdateFormatted, TO_CHAR(edc_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS edcEdateFormatted, edc_active AS edcActive FROM education WHERE edc_no = #{edcNo}
SELECT cur_no AS curNo, edc_no AS edcNo, cur_name AS curName FROM curriculum WHERE edc_no = '1' ORDER BY cur_no ASC

SELECT b.book_no AS bookNo, b.book_name AS bookName, b.book_price AS bookPrice, b.book_company AS bookCompany, e.edc_no AS edcNo, e.edc_book_no AS edcBookNo FROM book b JOIN education e ON b.book_no = e.edc_book_no WHERE e.edc_no = #{edcNo}
SELECT COUNT(ee_number) FROM emp_edc WHERE empl_no = '202501002'
